caption.p:
Distribution of Argentine ant ( Linepithema humile) supercolonies of different haplotypes in each introduced region (partially modified by Tsutsui et al.
22 ; Giraud et al.
16 ; Corin et al.
23 ; Inoue et al.
18 ) and the locations of the sampling sites in this study. The name of each supercolony follows Inoue et al.
18 . The world map was plotted by R
25 using 1: 50Â m million scale vector data (ver. 4.0.0) provided by Natural Earth ( https://www.naturalearthdata.com/downloads/50m-physical-vectors/).
